column2: Wait for survivor to chop down the tree
Wait for survivor to harvest the tree
Put a blueprint of tree on a raft
Put a blueprint of rot floor
When a seagull lands, <color=#CF6C00>[Right Click]</color>on it to attack
When a shark bites the raft, <color=#CF6C00>[Right Click]</color>on it to attack
Wait for it to consume food
Wait for it to generate rot
Put a blueprint of flax on a rot floor
Select a survivor who can level up
Assign the bedroom to a survivor
Put a blueprint of paddle on a raft surrounded with sea
Demolish a building to recycle wood
Click [Lemon Tree] on the Floor Panel
Wait for survivors to plant it.
Select a survivor on an island.
Go near to resources and collect them
Active an item in the [Survival Knowledge] menu.
Select a survivor equipped with a fishingrod.
Right click water to command survivor to fish.
